pullRequest.title: Throttle setFunction getFunction
pullRequest.bodyText:
getF setF moved to Throttle interface default.
getFunction, setFunction, getFunctionMomentary, setFunctionMomentary now main functions.
Momentary functions to single array.
Hardware throttles override setFunction from single setF .
Add incoming XNetThrottle F13Momentary ( missing from parse list, gap in bitmap )
Various Function loop code simplifications.

commit.message:
Move Function gets sets to Interface

getF setF moved to interface default.
getFunction, setFunction, getFunctionMomentary, setFunctionMomenttary now main functions.

Update AbstractThrottle.java

remove single function getF / setF.
Momentary functions to single array

HW Throttles

move throttles from single setF to setFunction.
Add XNetThrottle F13Momentary

nodes.bodyText: All these default methods should be public. In Java 11+, interfaces can have non-public methods, so while these are effectively public in Java 8, I don’t think they are in Java 11+.
There is a specific JunitUtil method for handling the BlockManager (which I see no attempt to terminate in this test, so the comments incorrect).
